title: Linux uucico Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the uucico command in Linux, learn how to configure it for file transfer, and execute remote connections and file transfers using practical examples.

meta.title: Linux uucico Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the uucico command in Linux, learn how to configure it for file transfer, and execute remote connections and file transfers using practical examples.
meta.keywords: Linux, uucico, file transfer, remote connection, networking, communication

verify.name: Verify uucico version
verify.hint: Make sure the output of `uucico --version` command matches the expected version "uucico (UUCP) 1.07".

verify.name: Verify uucico configuration
verify.hint: Make sure the output of `sudo uucico -r1 -ssystem` command includes the "Connected." message, indicating a successful connection to the remote system.

steps.title: Executing uucico for Remote Connection and File Transfer

verify.name: Verify file transfer
verify.hint: Make sure the output of `sudo uucico -r1 -ssystem -l ~/project/test_file.txt -r ~/project/test_file.txt` command includes the "Sending ~/project/test_file.txt to /home/remote_user/uucp/test_file.txt" message, indicating the file was transferred successfully.
